item.title: An Example Pelican + Git Blog Post Workflow
item.description:
On my Windows subsystem for Linux environment, I am now publishing new blog posts following this Pelican-based workflow:

  1. Activate the Python environment:
cd Your_Env/bin & source activate
  1. Go to the project folder:
cd /home/username/my_project
  1. Run Python script to create new markdown file from a template:
